summary: Water quality is stable and within acceptable ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and the selected plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; current level is optimal.
Monitor TDS; ensure it stays below 500 ppm for optimal growth.
Maintain temperature between 24°C and 30°C; current level is acceptable.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.032 / 7.005 / 7.113 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 335.514 / 310.0 / 342.7 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 23.914 / 20.94 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
